data.title: Senior Content Marketing Manager (Remote)
data.description:
Would you like to become part of a fast-growing start-up? Work in an environment where we value open conversations, flat hierarchy and personal commitment? A place where we work with a modern infrastructure and put our customers at the centre of our work?

JOB DESCRIPTION

We are looking for a Senior Content Marketing Manager to ensure we continue to grow in the online marketing space. You will work closely with our management, sales and product development teams to continually discover new opportunities to market our software to our target audiences. You should already have very solid knowledge in various areas of online marketing, mainly SEO (keyword strategies), texting / text optimisation and project management.

Your main tasks include the administration, commissioning, optimisation and creation of content for the development of our online presences and campaigns. Coordinating processes with external service providers and optimising our campaigns is your daily business. You define and prioritise new activities and are responsible for their implementation. Thanks to your interest in new trends, you are always finding new aspects of our software and developing exciting use cases with our customers. Blog articles, newsletters and LinkedIn posts are all part of your job.

An organised approach to work and strategic thinking, as well as open, clear communication are essential for this role. You should have a proactive doer mentality, be detail-focused and want to drive issues and projects forward. If you have both marketing knowledge and a talent for writing, we look forward to receiving your application!

Tasks

  • Managing, commissioning and creating content to build our online presence and campaigns
  • Optimisation of content, using up to date marketing methods
  • Coordination of processes with external service providers
  • Monitoring and managing campaign processes on various channels
  • Planning and implementation of innovative ideas to market our software to our target groups

Requirements

  • Bachelor's / Master's degree
  • Proven work experience in relevant areas of online marketing (preferably B2B)
  • Passion and understanding in product marketing, as well as content marketing
  • Knowledge and understanding of SEO, and other relevant marketing methods
  • Proactive personality with excellent project management skills
  • Excellent communication skills (oral as well as written)
  • English as mother tongue and fluency in another European language

Benefits

  • A highly motivated, collegial team
  • Great influence on a fast-growing B2B SaaS start-up
  • A dynamic environment and innovative product
  • Remuneration in line with the market
  • Remote work with regular attendance at our modern workplace in Zurich (Andreasturm)

ABOUT TIMLY SOFTWARE

Timly is a cloud-based inventory management software for companies to automatically track and manage their inventory. We help companies to

>>> Reduce material loss and search costs,

>>> Ensure equipment, machinery and facilities are working when they need to be,

>>> perform quality control and comply with regulatory/safety requirements.

In Timly, we centralise all inventory-related information in the cloud, creating operational efficiencies across the business by providing a 360° view of all assets. Each asset gets its own QR code, connecting the physical world with the digital world. We put all the information where the inventory is. All the user has to do is scan the QR code with their smartphone and they can manage the asset digitally in the office, on the construction site, in a warehouse or in a hospital.

In der Berufstherapie ist es unsere Aufgabe, die RehabilitandInnen, sprich Jugendliche und junge Erwachsene, durch eine individuelle Betreuung in Kleingruppen gezielt auf die Ausbildung oder bisherige berufliche Tätigkeit vorzubereiten. Dies geschieht durch berufsfeldbezogene medizinische Belastungserprobung, Arbeitstherapie, Berufsfindungsmaßnahmen und Arbeitserprobungen.   • Administrative, dokumentarische und organisatorische Aufgaben (MS-Office)

Die pulsierende Universitätsstadt Konstanz ist die größte Stadt am Bodensee. Mit ihren rund 84.000 Einwohnern ist sie zugleich das Verwaltungszentrum des Landkreises und kultureller Mittelpunkt der Region. Hier trifft Geschichte auf die Moderne. Das zeigt sich in der Architektur, aber auch in dem reichen Kulturleben der Stadt. Museen, Theater, Konzerte, Festivals und vieles mehr werden hier das ganze Jahr hinweg angeboten. Die Altstadt und die Hafenmeile mit ihren vielfältigen Gastronomieangeboten sind beliebte Treffpunkte für Jung und Alt. Die Endoskopie Abteilung am Klinikum Konstanz (Leiter: Herr Dr. David Arntzen) zeichnet sich durch ein großes Spektrum diagnostischer und therapeutischer Interventionen aus. Neben den Standardverfahren der gastroenterologischen Endoskopie (Gastroskopie, Koloskopie, Dünndarmendoskopie, Endosonographie, ERCP und Cholangioskopie) bieten wir auch Mini-Laparoskopien zur Diagnostik von Lebererkrankungen an.
